alert.note: Alert for Middle North Platte River Basin, Niobrara and Converse High Plains; Niobrara, Lower Elevations of Converse, Thunder Basin National Grassland (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 31 at 2:12PM MDT until November 01 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 6 PM MDT TUESDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 417, 418, AND 434... The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from noon to 6 PM MDT Tuesday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zone 434 in the northern Nebraska Panhandle and fire weather zones 417 and 418 in east-central Wyoming. * WIND...Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts around 35 mph. * HUMIDITY...Around 12-15 percent * HAINES...4 to 5 * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Middle North Platte River Basin, Niobrara and Converse High Plains; Niobrara, Lower Elevations of Converse, Thunder Basin National Grassland
